patient_info: Urinary hesitancy,Urinary incontinence,Prostatitis,Syncope,Muscle weakness,Elevated circulating creatine kinase concentration,Exercise intolerance,Loss of consciousness,Pedal edema,ST segment elevation,Increased circulating creatine kinase MB isoform,Dysuria,Amaurosis fugax
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Urospinia - a rare disease characterized by urinary symptoms such as hesitancy and incontinence, as well as muscle weakness and elevated creatine kinase levels.
2. Myasthenia gravis - an autoimmune disorder that causes muscle weakness and elevated creatine kinase levels.
3. Inflammatory myopathy - a type of muscle disease caused by inflammation and muscle damage.
4. Acute ischemic stroke - a sudden onset of muscle weakness and difficulty speaking, which can be caused by a stroke.
5. Chronic fatigue syndrome - a complex and poorly understood disorder characterized by persistent muscle weakness, fatigue, and cognitive impairment.
6. Neuromyelitis optica - a rare autoimmune disorder that affects the nervous system and causes muscle weakness, vision loss, and other symptoms.
7. Myelofibrosis - a type of fibrosis of the bone marrow that can cause muscle weakness and elevated creatine kinase levels.
8. Sepsis - a severe infection that can cause muscle weakness, fever, and organ dysfunction.
9. Encephalomyopathy - a type of brain disease that can cause muscle weakness, fever, and cognitive impairment.
10. Postural vertigo - a condition characterized by a spinning sensation and muscle weakness, which can be caused by inner ear problems.
